Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{3: 'Sneaking before the database terminal, Murray connects his primed data weapon to the database.'}
{3: '[Accessing Gestalt Core Database: 3-3-2-2-S-Luden]'}
{3: '[Authority Level Required: (&*T*&Ytby]'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'The data corruption is already so severe...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Murray selects a program out of his pocket terminal installed with a temporary code library from the Spear of F.O.S.'}
{3: 'Activating the program, he directs it to the gateway that connects to the file database.'}
{3: '[Incoming unknown connection]'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Let's hope you aren't prepared for this. Or else it'll be trouble.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Activating breaker override, A-E-V-C-Ω.', 4: '1'}
{3: '*Parameters received*'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Asimov came up with this thing on a coffee break... or so President Hassen said.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'This better work out...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "If it weren't for Commander Nikola, I would prefer not to work with you people.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "These are Commander Nikola's direct orders."}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's not like he can kill me for refusing to comply. I don't meddle with what they do, but without me, they certainly can't accomplish their goals.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Unlike you little beetles, I'm not a disposable pawn.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "But, since I've said yes to your dirty work, you can expect it to be executed perfectly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "And for this, I've already gotten what I needed to know from Nikola.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "If that's the case, what's with the hard talk?"}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Because, I dislike you curs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Commandants like the Gray Raven Commandant will be the key to recovering Earth, but you... will be nothing but blades rusting in blood.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Hey, V, you hear that? Someone's calling you a dog again."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'So?'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Somebody's gotta play the dog, so others can play the human."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Good people, bad people—they all need dogs that don't ask questions."}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Which is why, I despise you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Can we return to the mission? I'm about to lose my patience."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'You helping us out or not? Chief, decide already. I suggest you do it quickly.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "...I'll give you the coordinates of the invader, but only if you tell me what your plans are.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "We're monitoring. And to stop this fella from standing in our way."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "We gave a warning at the memorial park. Let's hope this little rat takes a hint."}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '...Monitoring who?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'That does not concern you.'}
